description: This file implements the HttpClient class, providing methods for HTTP operations such as GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE using libcurl. It manages HTTP headers, performs network requests, and retrieves responses, including response headers and codes.

classes.name: HttpClient
classes.description: A class providing static methods to perform HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) over network using libcurl.

methods.name: long Get(const std::string & url,const std::string & authToken,std::string & response,std::string & responseHeader)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the specified URL with an authorization token. Outputs the response body and headers, and returns the HTTP status code.

methods.name: long Post(const string & url,const string & authToken,const string & data,std::string & response,std::string & responseHeader)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request to the specified URL with an authorization token and JSON payload. Outputs response body and headers, and returns the HTTP status code.

methods.name: long Delete(const std::string & url,const std::string & authToken,std::string & response,std::string & responseHeader)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP DELETE request to the specified URL with an authorization token. Outputs response body and headers, and returns the HTTP status code.

methods.name: long Put(const std::string & url,const std::string & authToken,const std::string & data,std::string & response,std::string & responseHeader)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP PUT request to the specified URL with an authorization token and JSON payload. Outputs response body and headers, and returns the HTTP status code.

methods.name: size_t CurlWriteCallback(void * contents,size_t size,size_t nmemb,void * userp)

ctags.name: CurlWriteCallback
ctags.pattern: /^        static size_t CurlWriteCallback(void *contents, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *userp)$/
